articles.title: Bruce Willis's wife Emma Heming and ex-wife Demi Moore join blended family on Mother's Day - Daily Mail
articles.description: Emma, 44, took to Instagram on Sunday to share a sweet group photo which included Demi, 60, and her three daughters: Rumer Willis, 34, Scout Willis, 31, and Tallulah Willis, 29.
articles.content: Bruce Willis's wife Emma Heming and ex-wife Demi Moore joined new mom Rumer as their blended family put on a united front and celebrated Mother's Day together amid the A-list actor's dementia battle.… [+11847 chars]

articles.title: The secret of Liam Neeson's success: a monomaniacal fixation on … tea? - The Guardian
articles.description: The perma-frowning Taken star has revealed that he will only consider a script worthwhile if it manages to stop him thinking about his next cuppa. How do you live like this?
